thread.title: Contractor's blunder leads to airport terminal evacuation
thread.title_full: Contractor's blunder leads to airport terminal evacuation

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Contractor's blunder leads to airport terminal evacuation
text:
Contractor's blunder leads to airport terminal evacuation   10, 2015 eTN   
FORT LAUDERDALE, FL - Terminal 3 at Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport was briefly evacuated today, after the contractor accidentally cut the fire sprinkler system line. 
Few dozen passengers were told to leave the terminal until the sprinkler system could be fixed. 
Travelers were allowed to return to the terminal in about two hours.
